subtitleNullable: Macaws images and labels for object detection
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was created for an activity in a Data Science Specialization, we thought in using macaws because it's a native animal of Amazon Forest. Currently, it only has "blue-macaw" class but we can improve this dataset and add other classes.

### Content

All the images has different sizes so you need to resizing before doing any trainning. The dataset contains 240 images, divided in 70% for train, 20% for valid and 10% test, initially it had 100 images and we did a data augmentation process.

Currently it has one class: `blue-macaw`, the labels were exported for YOLOV5.

**Note:** This datasets contains only few images because we had only week to create it.

### Acknowledgements
Special thanks for Roboflow for initially hosting this dataset, allowing us to do annotation and data augmentation, and another special thanks for my partner [Francisco Marcelo](https://www.kaggle.com/fmmdamasceno) that helped me building this dataset.

### License
All the images were collected from Flickr distributed with Creative Common, and this dataset uses CC BY 4.0 License, so you are free to use it.
